itemInfo.itemDesc:
This Cooking ingredient can be obtained primarily by Farming.
Usage: Fruit Juice, Fruit Pudding, etc.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Farming Grape Seeds in a Garden or by Gathering from Grapes using Bare Hands or a Hoe.

 â€» Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but will cause pain.

item.name: Grape Crate
item.desc: A crop that was Processed to increase its marketability. It can be sold to Traders.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Crafted using a Workbench.
